name: nfhs-date-diff
description: small date library to deal with NFHS dates as suggested here https://www.nfhs.org/media/885653/calendar-brochure.pdf

scripts.build: babel -d build index.js && browserify build/index.js -o build/nfhs-date-diff.js -s NFHS-date-diff
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
